name: Stonekeep: Bones of the Ancestors
overview: Stonekeep. The legendary city was once ruined by a dark god’s magick, but saved by your ancestors. Now the legend of Stonekeep requires a new hero: You. Explore dungeons, watch out for deadly traps, fight monsters with a variety of weapons or control dangerous magicks. The choice is yours. But all is not lost. There are allies within the halls of Stonekeep. Choose one to help lead you to victory. Features • Wield melee weapons or throw projectile weapons • Discover new magicks and cast compound spells • Seven different dungeon levels to explore • Defeat monsters and loot treasures
